title: Project: Implementing a TWAP/VWAP Execution Algo
content:
## Advanced Execution

Institutional investors don't just click "Buy". They use algos to minimize market impact.

### TWAP (Time Weighted)

Simple: Divide order size by N time intervals. Execute slice every T minutes.

### VWAP (Volume Weighted)

Complex: Estimate volume profile for the day (e.g., "U" shape). Execute more when market is active. Compare your execution price against the market VWAP benchmark.
